text:
Oh, Kogane...!
You're doing great today!~!

It just makes me happy to see the fans' faces at the live shows,
and it gives me strength too~
Do you feel like you have to work even harder?

Yeah!
Ya' sure do get it, Producer!
When we meet at the next live show--

It'd be a real surprise if I could say,
I've gotten a lot better at singing and dancing than before~!

That's one of the things that makes you so great, Kogane.
You're our pride, an idol worth cheering for.

When you praise me like that, Producer,
it gives me even more strength to keep goin'~!

I'll practice a whole lot,
and become an amazing idol~!
